column4: Can anyone help me with removing GRUB so i only can boot windows (i need to remove the linux-hdd, maybe even remove linux totally)?
why would you want to do something crazy like that?
reinstall windows, it will rewrite grub
becuase the hdd that linux is on right now is on 6gb and i need to put a 120gb hdd in it's place and i need to use windows during the time i'm changing hdd
